movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency inside Shawshank State Penitentiary.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman faces his greatest psychological and physical test when the Joker unleashes chaos on Gotham, forcing him to confront the thin line between heroism and vigilantism.

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully plant an idea into a target's subconscious.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a charismatic soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something far more dangerous and subversive.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival as Earth becomes increasingly uninhabitable.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A computer hacker learns that reality is a simulated construct controlled by intelligent machines and joins a rebellion to free humanity.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A betrayed Roman general is forced into slavery and rises through the ranks of the gladiatorial arena to seek revenge against the corrupt emperor.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A young hobbit and his companions set out on a perilous journey to destroy a powerful ring and prevent the Dark Lord Sauron from conquering Middle-earth.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in a series of darkly comedic and violent stories.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son, leading to betrayal, violence, and a transformation into a ruthless leader.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The life journey of Forrest Gump, a kind-hearted man with a low IQ who unintentionally influences several historical events in the United States.

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.description: A death row prison guard discovers that one of the inmates possesses mysterious healing powers that challenge his understanding of justice and humanity.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.description: A young FBI trainee seeks the help of imprisoned cannibal Hannibal Lecter to catch another serial killer.

movies.title: Saving Private Ryan
movies.description: During World War II, a group of U.S. soldiers goes behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.

movies.title: Whiplash
movies.description: A young jazz drummer enrolls at a prestigious music conservatory where an abusive instructor pushes him to the brink of his abilities.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after his father's death, only to return years later to reclaim his rightful place as king.

movies.title: The Social Network
movies.description: The story of the founding of Facebook and the legal battles that followed among its creators.

movies.title: Joker
movies.description: A mentally troubled comedian descends into madness and becomes the infamous criminal mastermind known as the Joker.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop Loki and his alien army from conquering the planet.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy household, leading to unexpected and dark consequences.

movies.title: Django Unchained
movies.description: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner.

movies.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.description: The rise and fall of stockbroker Jordan Belfort, whose life of excess and fraud ultimately catches up with him.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.description: A love story unfolds aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic as two passengers from different social classes fall in love.

movies.title: Braveheart
movies.description: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads a rebellion against English rule in the 13th century.

movies.title: The Truman Show
movies.description: A man discovers that his entire life has been staged as a reality television show and begins to question his reality.

movies.title: Se7en
movies.description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as the basis for his gruesome murders.

movies.title: La La Land
movies.description: An aspiring actress and a passionate jazz musician fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

movies.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
movies.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa to escape a tyrannical warlord in a high-speed desert chase.
